snippet: A House subcommittee examined the potential complications of relaxing marijuana laws in Washington, a city controlled by Congress and policed both by federal and local law enforcement agencies.
abstract: House oversight subcommittee hearing examines potential complications of relaxing marijuana laws in Washington, DC, city controlled by Congress and policed both by federal and local law enforcement; includes testimony from Metropolitan Police Dept, United States Park Police and representatives from the Justice Dept and American Civil Liberties Union, and focuses on legislation in one local government.
lead_paragraph: A House subcommittee examined the potential complications of relaxing marijuana laws in Washington, a city controlled by Congress and policed both by federal and local law enforcement agencies.

headline.main: Review of Marijuana Law Exposes List of Conflicts Between Jurisdictions
headline.print_headline: Review of Marijuana Law Exposes List of Conflicts Between Jurisdictions
